text:
nds over time for certain key 
perinatal indicators 
• select cases for presentation (all maternal deaths and selected perinatal deaths with learning points) 
• prepare of educational topic for presentation 
• select and notification of presenters for the various presentations 
• prepare of preliminary action plan (based on stats and lessons to be learnt from selected cases). The action 
plan will be further developed through discussion at the meeting 
• invitations can be sent by email or fax a
